name: Zombie Paradise - Mad Brains
description:
Challenge players and zombies fighting for survival and fame in the amazing online arenas!

A new multiplayer style. Challenge players in real time, in dynamic arenas crowded with zombies and traps.

Invite friends to battle, fight against players all over the world. Create hero, weapon and skill combinations.

Test your skills in the survival mode and fight against hordes of terrifying monsters!

Featured Strengths
- 8 unique arenas, with a variety of modes and themes
- 7 styles of weapon, with skins and different skills
- Create your own combination of characters, weapons and skills
- Daily missions
- SHRINKABLE gaming area. Escape from the gas!
- Exclusive characters and skins.

Coming soon
- New game modes
- New arenas
- More weapons and skins
… and much more!


Thank you por playing Zombie Paradise - Mad Brains, your feedback is very important to improve the game constantly. So, if you face any issues or if you have new ideas for the game, please email us: support@mazarigames.com
